summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing for F&F actual images update. All features working correctly: Menu page displays actual Fin & Feathers restaurant images for food items with images, and line items (no images) for Daily Specials, Sides, Cocktails, and Brunch Sides. MKT price labels display correctly for Lobster items. Gallery page and Homepage social feed show actual F&F images.
critical_code_review_comments: Menu data comes from mockData.js (MOCKED) - not from backend API
Gallery images are hardcoded in GalleryPage.jsx defaultGalleryItems array
Social feed images are hardcoded in LinkTreeHomePage.jsx defaultSocialFeedImages array
All images now use actual F&F website URLs (finandfeathersrestaurants.com)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All F&F image integration tested successfully. Menu items with layout:'line' or without images render as simple text line items. priceLabel:'MKT' displays correctly instead of price for Lobster items.

mocked_apis_list: Social feed images hardcoded in LinkTreeHomePage.jsx

menu_page_loads.details: Menu page loads with F&F images and proper category filtering

daily_specials_line_items.details: $5 Daily Specials (Food & Drinks) display as line items without images

starters_with_images.details: F&F Signature Wings, Chicken Thigh Nuggets, Fin's Tacos, etc. with actual F&F images

entrees_with_images.details: New Zealand Lamb Chops, Malibu Ribeye, Deep Fried Catfish with actual F&F images

seafood_grits_with_images.details: Catfish & Grits, Shrimp & Grits, Salmon & Grits, Lobster & Grits (MKT) with images

sandwiches_with_images.details: F&F Jerk Turkey Burger, Fire Chicken Sandwich, BBQ Chicken Sandwich with images. Add-ons as line items

brunch_with_images.details: Chicken & Waffle, Breakfast Burrito, Edgewood Breakfast, etc. with actual F&F images

sides_line_items.details: Mac & Cheese, Whipped Potatoes, etc. displayed as line items without images

cocktails_line_items.details: California Dreaming, Sunset Blvd, LAX Sidecar, etc. displayed as line items

brunch_sides_line_items.details: 2 Eggs, Bacon, Biscuit, Pancakes, Lobster Tail (MKT) displayed as line items

mkt_price_display.details: Lobster Tails, Lobster & Grits, Lobster Tail side all display 'MKT' instead of numeric price

gallery_page_ff_images.details: 19 gallery items with actual F&F food and ambiance images from finandfeathersrestaurants.com

homepage_social_feed.details: 4 social feed images showing actual F&F food (Wings, Shrimp & Grits, Malibu Ribeye, Chicken & Waffle)
